section.name: Introduction
section.p: The NeuClear Signer is a standalone application to allow digital signing of contracts in a normal web environment. The signer includes all tools necessary to create your own Identity in NeuClear.

section.name: Release 0.8.1 of NeuClear Signer
section.p: The current stable release of the NeuClear Signer, includes the following features:

ul.li: Simple Web Interface for normal Signing purposes
Executable Jar file that should run on any system with Java 1.4 and above.
Current target users are developers and power users. (You need to be able to open a console to initialize it.)

section.name: Road Map
section.p: Our aim for the next version 0.9 is to stabilize and freeze the underlying xml formats and standards as well as to create more userland tools. Thus the goal is to fix the underlying format making it easier for other implementations of NeuClear ID. This should be reached early on in January 2004
Our goal is for 1.0 the following release to be fairly polished from a usability standpoint. Our goal is to release this in February 2004.
